replies.msg: 剛剛restore 左部機無左禁電筒同相機個問題，可以試下

有朋友反饋和iPhone X一樣的不摸手機邊框（比如戴著手機殼）就會斷觸的問題。

在鎖屏界面嘗試上滑解鎖或者快速進入相機程序時，屏幕並不是每次能識別按壓或者滑動操作，一旦解鎖完成，觸摸不靈的問題就消失。而且，連接電源或者取下保護套摸一下中框就自動消失，懷疑是靜電導致，這究竟通過升級固件解決還是個問題。一旦解鎖，靈敏度問題就會消失。當插入電源充電時也不會存在該問題。

（個人猜測:1.電池供電問題，如果是這樣蘋果就面臨著大面積更換電池的狀況
2.處於鎖屏狀態下cpu降頻導致，等下一個版本即可）

replies.msg:
Here's some insider info, guys - take it or leave it.
The issue is a hardware one (in short - Mini is too small for modern components, and some hacky solutions had to be applied), and it's much more pronounced on lock screen due to protection against butt dials. The flaw was discovered at later stages of production, so the cutout in official silicone case is not a whimsical decision. Apple is preparing a statement currently, and the course of actions is most likely a recall of big batch of Minis. There is a chance they may try to do it in a similar way to iPhone 4 - I don't know the details of this solution, but if they go this way it'd most likely be a case with some conductive parts per customer. I've also heard about probably trying to goad users into not using screen protectors, but that is already well into rumors territory.

quote.msg:
Here's some insider info, guys - take it or leave it.
The issue is a hardware one (in short - Mini is too small for modern components, and some hacky solutions had to be applied), and it's much more pronounced on lock screen due to protection against butt dials. The flaw was discovered at later stages of production, so the cutout in official silicone case is not a whimsical decision. Apple is preparing a statement currently, and the course of actions is most likely a recall of big batch of Minis. There is a chance they may try to do it in a similar way to iPhone 4 - I don't know the details of this solution, but if they go this way it'd most likely be a case with some conductive parts per customer. I've also heard about probably trying to goad users into not using screen protectors, but that is already well into rumors territory.

pinned.msg:
我都有解鎖問題，用緊air jacket+普通玻璃貼，頭先走左去apple store，做左以下嘅測試：

1）冇case，普通mon貼：冇事
2）Air jacket case，冇mon貼：冇事
3）原廠case（試哂咁多款），belkin mon貼：有事
4）原廠case（試哂咁多款），冇mon貼：冇事
5）冇case，belkin mon貼：冇事

以上嘅步驟，換左demo機，情況都一樣

所以genius 嘅結論係等ios 14.3，因為以上嘅問題，即使換左另一部機，都依然會出現

另外，佢地有提到，有人試左 ios 14.3 beta，就冇再出現問題

以上畀大家參考下
